content: Mi ha detto che non aveva paura.
translations: eng:He told me he was unafraid
eng:He told me he wasn't afraid
eng:He told me that he was unafraid
eng:She told me she was unafraid
eng:She told me she wasn't afraid
eng:She told me that she was unafraid
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
